lead_paragraph: Citigroup plans to almost triple its work force in China by hiring up to 7,500 people in the next three years, Reuters said, citing a Bloomberg interview with an executive published on Tuesday.
snippet: Citigroup plans to almost triple its workforce in China by hiring up to 7,500 people in the next three years.

headline.main: Citigroup to Hire Up to 7,500 in China

abstract: Citigroup plans to almost triple its workforce in China by hiring up to 7,500 people in the next three years.
